description:
Enable downloading entire playlists or all videos from a channel with a single URL. Provide options to filter by date range, video count limits, or exclude already-downloaded items.

**Rationale:** Users often want to archive entire series, courses, or content creator channels. Manual URL entry for dozens or hundreds of videos is impractical and error-prone.
title: Playlist and channel download support
